Oh BTW, has anyone ever thought up of a Full Metal Panic/MLP crossover? I thought that'd be funny as hell to have a child soldier like Sagara involved with the peaceful world of Equestria. And then have him screw everything up in some comical fashion.

I'm sure Celestia and Luna would get a kick out of that.

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54487b326368726172300000#post_54487b326368726172300000

Maybe, I'm looking into the premise that the pilot is initially captured by the ponies, and then breaks out and causes a bit of mess. And then escapes off into the Everfree Forest. As for the stuff after that, its going to vary. 

I'm looking into three possible kind of story lines to follow, either it has the pilot siding with the ponies cooperatively, then again it'll follow much like Article 2 on FIMfiction, maybe not as much, but sort of like that story. 

Or its more like the human character interacting with Equestria in a more secluded fashion. Around Ponyville probably, and have him doing things between Everfree and so forth. 

Or just have it as a comedy kind of story with lots of fillers and so forth, randomness is boundless. 'Shrug'.
